traits.personalityTraits:
I don’t run from evil. Evil runs from me.
I spend money freely and live life to the fullest, knowing that tomorrow I might die.
traits.ideals: I kill monsters to make the world a safer place, and to exorcise my own demons. (Good)
traits.bonds: A terrible guilt consumes me. I hope that I can find redemption through my actions.
traits.flaws: I feel no compassion for the dead. They’re the lucky ones.

notes.personalPossessions:
Deed of house
Deed of Windmill
Will of Durst, Gustav and Elizabeth
